name: An Elder Scrolls Legend: Battlespire
description: Uses the files from the Windows installer from GOG.
notes:
- Current version of Lutris DOSBOX runner does not seem to support compressed audio.  For workaround, select 1 in the launcher 'Battlespire Game (no music fix).  Game will work without crashing when a character speaks, but no music will play.

- To get music working:
1 - Install DOSBOX - (on Mint 19: sudo apt install dosbox)
2 - Backup the Lutris DOSBOX runner (on Mint 19: mv ~/.local/share/lutris/runners/dosbox/bin/dosbox ~/.local/share/lutris/runners/dosbox/bin/dosbox.bak)
3 - Symlink installed DOSBOX binary to Lutris local directory (on Mint 19: ln -s /usr/bin/dosbox ~/.local/share/lutris/runners/dosbox/bin/)
4 - Run Battlespire in Lutris and select 2 in the launcher 'Battlespire Game (with music - currently not working).

- I cannot get fullscreen working with this game.

write_file.content:
[ipx]
# ipx: Enable ipx over UDP/IP emulation.
ipx=false

[autoexec]
 @echo off
 cls
 ECHO  -----------------------------------------------------------
 ECHO  An Elder Scrolls Legend: Battlespire Lutris DOSBox Launcher
 ECHO  -----------------------------------------------------------
 ECHO   1) Battlespire Game (no music fix)
 ECHO   2) Battlespire Game (with music - currently not working)
 ECHO   3) Battlespire Settings
 ECHO   4) Battlespire Client
 ECHO   5) Battlespire Server
 ECHO  -----------------------------------------------------------
 ECHO   6) exit program
 ECHO  -----------------------------------------------------------

 choice /c123456 /s Which game do you want to run? 1-6: /n
 if errorlevel 6 goto exit
 if errorlevel 5 goto batserv
 if errorlevel 4 goto batclient
 if errorlevel 3 goto batsettings
 if errorlevel 2 goto battle
 if errorlevel 1 goto batfix

 :batfix
 cls
 mount c ".."
 imgmount d "../gamenomus.ins" -t iso
 c:
 spire.bat
 exit

 :battle
 cls
 mount c ".."
 imgmount d "../gamelinuxpath.ins" -t iso
 c:
 spire.bat
 exit

 :batsettings
 cls
 mount c ".."
 imgmount d "../gamenomus.ins" -t iso
 c:
 INSTALL.EXE
 exit

 :batclient
 cls
 mount c ".."
 imgmount d "../gamenomus.ins" -t iso
 c:
 ipxnet connect 127.0.0.1 
 spire.bat
 exit

 :batserv
 cls
 mount c ".."
 imgmount d "../gamenomus.ins" -t iso
 c:
 ipxnet startserver
 spire.bat
 exit

 :exit
 exit

FILE "game.gog" BINARY

FILE "MUSIC/Track02.ogg" MP3

- file1: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
- file2: https://lutris.net/files/tools/innoextract.tar.gz
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosbox_battlespire.conf
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $file2
- execute:
    args: -d "$CACHE" "$file1"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/app
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX
    src: $GAMEDIR/dosbox_battlespire.conf
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosbox_battlespire.conf
    key: aspect
    section: render
    value: true
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosbox_battlespire.conf
    key: output
    section: sdl
    value: overlay
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosbox_battlespire.conf
    key: fullscreen
    section: sdl
    value: false
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosbox_battlespire.conf
    key: fullresolution
    section: sdl
    value: 1920x1080
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosbox_battlespire.conf
    key: midiconfig
    section: midi
    value: '128:0'
